name: Cargills Kuruluthuda Rice
description: Kuruluthuda comes from a word meaning 'bird's beak', and is a delectable and nutritious red rice variety, rich in proteins and fiber. This rice variety improves bladder function and is proven to have a lower glycemic index compared to other common rice varieties. It is also used to treat skin conditions and was once considered an aphrodisiac.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
